IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{greeting_keywords}}[0] OR {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{greeting_keywords}}[1]

    {{judgement}} = 0

ELIF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{internal_keywords}}[0] OR {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{internal_keywords}}[1]
    {{judgement}} = 0
    {{content}} = ""

        DEFINE {{scene_kw_list}}: List = {{scene_keywords}}[{{scene}}]

        DEFINE {{scene_kw_hit}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{scene_action_hit}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
                {{scene_kw_hit}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{action}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{action}}
                {{scene_action_hit}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{scene_kw_hit}} AND {{scene_action_hit}}

    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_hit}}

        {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
    ELSE
        DEFINE {{action_hit}}: Boolean = False

            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{info}} IN {{info_keywords}}

        ENDFOR
        IF {{action_hit}} AND {{info_hit}}

            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0
            {{content}} = ""
        ENDIF
    ENDIF

{{output_json}} = CALL format_json({{judgement}}, {{content}})
RETURN {{output_json}}

    ctx["action_keywords"], ctx["content"], ctx["info_keywords"], ctx["judgement"], ctx["non_trigger_phrases"], ctx["scene_actions"], ctx["scene_keywords"] = step_1_compute_judgement(ctx.get("input_text"))

    # Module 7: step_7_generate_relay_content

    # Module 8: step_8_compute_judgement
    ctx["_"], ctx["content"], ctx["judgement"] = step_8_compute_judgement()

    return ctx

FOR {{kw}} IN {{report_keywords}}

        {{is_report}} = True

FOR {{kw}} IN {{internal_keywords}}
    IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}

    ENDIF
ENDFOR
IF {{is_greeting}} OR {{is_report}} OR {{is_internal}}
    {{judgement}} = 0
    {{content}} = ""
ELSE
    DEFINE {{scene_matched}}: Boolean = False
    FOR {{scene}} IN {{scene_keywords}}
        DEFINE {{scene_kw_list}}: List = {{scene_keywords}}[{{scene}}]
        DEFINE {{scene_action_list}}: List = {{scene_actions}}[{{scene}}]
        DEFINE {{kw_matched}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{action_matched}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
                {{kw_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{act}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{kw_matched}} AND {{action_matched}}
            {{scene_matched}} = True
        ENDIF
    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_matched}}
        {{judgement}} = 1
        {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
    ELSE
        DEFINE {{action_found}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{info_found}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{act}} IN {{action_keywords}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_found}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{info}} IN {{info_keywords}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{info}}
                {{info_found}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{action_found}} AND {{info_found}}
            {{judgement}} = 1
            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0
            {{content}} = ""
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
ENDIF

    "judgement": {{judgement}},
    "content": {{content}}
}
RETURN {{result}}

DEFINE {{action_keywords}}: List = ["æ ¸å®", "ç¡®è®¤", "æ•²å®š", "æ‰“å¬", "é—®é—®", "äº†è§£ä¸‹", "æ¢ä¸‹", "å’¨è¯¢ä¸‹", "åé¦ˆ", "è½¬è¾¾", "åŒæ­¥", "æ²Ÿé€š", "å‚¬ä¸€ä¸‹", "æé†’ä¸‹", "å•†é‡", "åè°ƒ", "èƒ½ä¸èƒ½", "è¡Œä¸è¡Œ", "è¦ä¸è¦", "æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯", "å¥½ä¸å¥½", "éœ€ä¸éœ€è¦"]
DEFINE {{info_keywords}}: List = ["æ—¶é—´", "æ¡£æœŸ", "èŠ‚ç‚¹", "ç´ æ", "æ ·å“", "ç”»é¢", "æ–‡æ¡ˆ", "è„šæœ¬", "é£æ ¼", "æˆæƒ", "logo", "å‘ç¥¨", "æŠ¥é”€", "æ¯”ä¾‹", "å–ç‚¹", "å†…å®¹", "å®¢æœ", "åœºåœ°", "èŠ‚ç‚¹", "é“¾æ¥", "è´¹ç”¨", "å‘å¸ƒ", "å¯„é€", "åˆ°è´¦"]
DEFINE {{greeting_keywords}}: List = ["è¾›è‹¦", "è°¢è°¢", "æ‚¨å¥½", "æ—©ä¸Šå¥½", "æ™šä¸Šå¥½", "è¾›è‹¦å•¦", "æ„Ÿè°¢"]
DEFINE {{report_keywords}}: List = ["å·²ä¸Šä¼ ", "æ‹å®Œ", "å®Œæˆ", "å·²å®Œæˆ", "å·²å‘", "å·²æäº¤", "å·²å¤„ç†"]

DEFINE {{is_report}}: Boolean = False
FOR {{kw}} IN {{report_keywords}}
    IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
        {{is_report}} = True
    ENDIF
ENDFOR
DEFINE {{is_internal}}: Boolean = False
FOR {{kw}} IN {{internal_keywords}}

IF {{is_greeting}} OR {{is_report}} OR {{is_internal}}
    {{judgement}} = 0

        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}

        FOR {{act}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{kw_matched}} AND {{action_matched}}
            {{scene_matched}} = True
        ENDIF
    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_matched}}

            {{judgement}} = 1
            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0

RETURN {{result}}

DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity}}: Float
DEFINE {{cache_hit}}: Boolean
DEFINE {{cache_result}}: Any
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
DEFINE {{user_priority}}: Integer
DEFINE {{current_requests}}: Integer
DEFINE {{max_concurrent}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{qps}}: Integer
DEFINE {{response_time}}: Float
DEFINE {{feedback_count}}: Integer = 0
DEFINE {{cache_duration}}: Integer = 30  # åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{sensitive_words}}: List = ["è¿è§„å†…å®¹1", "è¿è§„å†…å®¹2"]
DEFINE {{log_retention}}: Dict = {
    "error": 90,
    "access": 30,
    "debug": 7
}
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{duration_threshold}}: Integer = 10  # åˆ†é’Ÿ
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_n=3)
    ELIF {{similarity}} < 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_search(top_n=5)
    ENDIF
    IF NOT {{cache_hit}}
        {{cache_result}} = CALL generate_cache({{results}})
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{kg_results}}.empty
        {{kg_results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    {{cache_result}} = {{kg_results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_related"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis()
        {{doc}} = CALL generate_explanation({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{response}} = "æ— æ³•è¯†åˆ«çš„æŸ¥è¯¢ç±»å‹"
ENDIF
IF {{user_click_regen}}
    {{response}} = CALL strong_model_analysis()
    {{feedback_count}} = {{feedback_count}} + 1
    IF {{feedback_count}} >= 3
        CALL escalate_to_human()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{current_requests}} >= {{max_concurrent}}
    {{queue}}.append({{request}})
ELSE
    {{process}} = True
    IF {{user_priority}} > 5
        {{queue}}.insert(0, {{request}})
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS {{sensitive_words}}
    CALL log_to_security()
    RETURN "æœåŠ¡æ‹’ç»"
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > 3.0
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_logs({{log_retention}})
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}}
    CALL check_duration_and_alert()
ENDIF
RETURN {{response}}

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{vector_results_top_n}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{rerank_results_top_n}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{kg_search_depth}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30  # minutes
DEFINE {{max_code_lines}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{response_timeout}}: Float = 3.0  # seconds
DEFINE {{alert_qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 10  # minutes
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL vector_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    CALL graph_database_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    CALL code_analysis_engine()
ELSE
    CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
DEFINE {{vector_results}}: List
IF {{similarity_threshold}} > 0.85
    {{vector_results}} = get_top_n_results({{vector_results_top_n}})
ELSE
    {{vector_results}} = rerank_and_get_top_n({{rerank_results_top_n}})
ENDIF
DEFINE {{kg_results}}: List
FOR {{depth}} IN 1 TO {{kg_search_depth}}
    {{kg_results}} = expand_knowledge_graph({{depth}})
ENDFOR
IF {{kg_results}} IS NOT NULL
    RETURN {{kg_results}}
ELSE
    CALL full_graph_search()
ENDIF
DEFINE {{code_analysis_result}}: Dict
IF {{code_lines_count}} > {{max_code_lines}}
    {{code_analysis_result}} = static_analysis()
ELSE
    {{code_analysis_result}} = semantic_analysis()
    {{code_analysis_result}}.explanation = generate_code_explanation()
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    CALL enhanced_reasoning_model()
ENDIF
IF {{concurrent_requests}} > {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    WAIT until queue_available()
ENDIF
IF {{query_contains_sensitive_words}}
    REJECT request
    LOG security_event
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{response_timeout}}
    DEGRADE service
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{alert_qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF

DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30  # ç¼“å­˜æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸï¼ˆåˆ†é’Ÿï¼‰
DEFINE {{max_vector_results}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{re_ranked_results}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{kg_search_depth}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{code_lines_count}}: Integer
DEFINE {{concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{vip_priority}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{admin_priority}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_timeout}}: Integer = 3  # æ€»å“åº”æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰
DEFINE {{vector_search_timeout}}: Integer = 500  # å‘é‡æ£€ç´¢æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæ¯«ç§’ï¼‰
DEFINE {{kg_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1000  # å›¾æ•°æ®åº“æ£€ç´¢æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæ¯«ç§’ï¼‰
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2000  # ä»£ç åˆ†ææ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæ¯«ç§’ï¼‰
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL vector_search()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    CALL kg_search()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    CALL code_analysis_engine()
ELSE
    CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
FUNCTION vector_search()
    {{similarity}} = CALL calculate_similarity({{query}}, {{knowledge_base}})
    IF {{similarity}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL get_top_n_results({{similarity}}, n={{max_vector_results}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} < {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL re_ranking({{query}}, {{knowledge_base}})
        {{results}} = CALL get_top_n_results({{results}}, n={{re_ranked_results}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
FUNCTION kg_search()
    {{entities}} = CALL entity_extraction({{query}})
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_traversal({{entities}}, depth={{kg_search_depth}})
    ELSE
        {{kg_results}} = CALL full_kg_search()
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_results({{kg_results}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
    RETURN {{kg_results}}
FUNCTION code_analysis_engine()
    {{code_lines_count}} = CALL count_code_lines({{code}})
    IF {{code_lines_count}} > 500
        {{analysis_result}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
    ELIF {{code_lines_count}} < 500
        {{analysis_result}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
        {{analysis_result}}.explanation = CALL generate_explanation({{code}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis_result}}
FUNCTION handle_concurrency()
    {{current_requests}} = CALL get_current_requests()
    IF {{current_requests}} < {{concurrent_requests}}
        CALL process_request()
    ELSE
        CALL queue_request()
    ENDIF
    {{user_type}} = CALL get_user_type()
    IF {{user_type}} == "vip"
        {{priority}} = {{vip_priority}}
    ELIF {{user_type}} == "admin"
        {{priority}} = {{admin_priority}}
    ELSE
        {{priority}} = 1
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{priority}}
FUNCTION security_check()
    {{sensitive_content}} = CALL detect_sensitive_words({{query}})
    IF {{sensitive_content}} IS NOT NULL
        CALL log_security_event()
        RETURN False
    ENDIF
    IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
        {{verified}} = CALL verify_user_identity()
        IF NOT {{verified}}
            RETURN False
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
    RETURN True
FUNCTION check_response_time()
    {{start_time}} = CALL get_timestamp()
    {{vector_time}} = CALL measure_time(vector_search())
    IF {{vector_time}} > {{vector_search_timeout}}
        CALL log_performance_issue()
    ENDIF
    {{total_time}} = CALL get_timestamp() - {{start_time}}
    IF {{total_time}} > {{response_timeout}}
        CALL degrade_service()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{total_time}}
FUNCTION manage_logs()
    {{log_type}} = CALL determine_log_type()
    IF {{log_type}} == "error"
        CALL store_log(90)  # ä¿ç•™90å¤©
    ELIF {{log_type}} == "access"
        CALL store_log(30)  # ä¿ç•™30å¤©
    ELIF {{log_type}} == "debug"
        CALL store_log(7)   # ä¿ç•™7å¤©
    ENDIF
    CALL send_to_central_logging()
    RETURN True
FUNCTION monitor_system()
    {{qps}} = CALL calculate_qps()
    {{p95_latency}} = CALL calculate_p95_latency()
    {{cache_hit_rate}} = CALL calculate_cache_hit_rate()
    {{accuracy}} = CALL calculate_retrieval_accuracy()
    IF {{qps}} < 10
        {{duration}} = CALL check_duration({{qps}} < 10)
        IF {{duration}} >= 10  # æŒç»­10åˆ†é’Ÿ
            CALL trigger_alert()
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
    IF {{p95_latency}} > 3000  # 3ç§’
        {{duration}} = CALL check_duration({{p95_latency}} > 3000)
        IF {{duration}} >= 5  # æŒç»­5åˆ†é’Ÿ
            CALL scale_out()
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
    RETURN {
        "qps": {{qps}},
        "p95_latency": {{p95_latency}},
        "cache_hit_rate": {{cache_hit_rate}},
        "accuracy": {{accuracy}}
    }

91ee3a91.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity}}: Float
DEFINE {{vector_results}}: List
DEFINE {{kg_results}}: List
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
DEFINE {{user_type}}: String
DEFINE {{response_time}}: Float
DEFINE {{qps}}: Float
DEFINE {{cache_hit_rate}}: Float
DEFINE {{is_sensitive}}: Boolean
DEFINE {{is_finance}}: Boolean
DEFINE {{click_count}}: Integer
DEFINE {{error_count}}: Integer
DEFINE {{knowledge_base}}: String
DEFINE {{model_type}}: String
DEFINE {{code_language}}: String
DEFINE {{cache_duration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{max_concurrent}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{priority}}: Integer
DEFINE {{vi_a}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_b}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_c}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{log_days}}: Integer
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_threshold}}: Float = 3.0
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Float = 10.0
DEFINE {{p95_threshold}}: Float = 3.0
DEFINE {{max_click}}: Integer = 3
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{vector_results}} = CALL vector_search({{knowledge_base}}, top_k=3)
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= 0.85
        {{vector_results}} = CALL rerank_search({{knowledge_base}}, top_k=5)
    ELSE
        {{vector_results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{knowledge_base}})
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{kg_results}} IS NOT NULL
        RETURN {{kg_results}}
    ELSE
        {{kg_results}} = CALL full_search()
        CALL cache_results({{kg_results}}, duration={{cache_duration}})
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_language}} IN ["Python", "Java"]
        IF {{code_lines}} > 500
            {{analysis_result}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
        ELSE
            {{analysis_result}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
            {{doc}} = CALL generate_doc({{analysis_result}})
        ENDIF
    ELSE
        RETURN "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ELSE
    RETURN "Unknown query type"
ENDIF
IF {{click_count}} >= {{max_click}}
    {{model_type}} = "advanced"
ENDIF
IF {{user_type}} == "VIP"
    {{priority}} = 5
ELIF {{user_type}} == "admin"
    {{priority}} = 10
ELSE
    {{priority}} = 1
ENDIF
IF {{is_sensitive}} IS TRUE
    RETURN "Rejected: Sensitive content"
ENDIF
IF {{is_finance}} IS TRUE
    {{confirmation}} = CALL verify_identity()
    IF {{confirmation}} IS FALSE
        RETURN "Access denied"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{response_threshold}} FOR 5 MINUTES
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF
IF {{log_days}} == 90
    CALL delete_error_logs()
ELIF {{log_days}} == 30
    CALL delete_access_logs()
ELIF {{log_days}} == 7
    CALL delete_debug_logs()
ENDIF
IF {{error_count}} > 0
    CALL upload_logs("error")
ENDIF
IF {{cache_hit_rate}} < 0.7
    CALL optimize_cache()
ENDIF

DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{max_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{max_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 1800  # 30åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{vi_a}}: String = "medical"
DEFINE {{vi_b}}: String = "technical"
DEFINE {{vi_c}}: String = "legal"
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{response_timeout}}: Integer = 3000  # 3ç§’
DEFINE {{alert_qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 600  # 10åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{response_time_95_threshold}}: Integer = 3000  # 3ç§’
DEFINE {{response_time_95_duration}}: Integer = 300  # 5åˆ†é’Ÿ
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(max_results={{max_results_high})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(max_results={{max_results_low})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL kg_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        RETURN {{entities}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_search()
        RETURN {{results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis()
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis()
        {{doc}} = CALL generate_documentation()
        RETURN {{analysis}}, {{doc}}
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{response}} = CALL fallback_handler()
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_click}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL enhanced_model()
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_satisfaction}} < 3 AND {{retry_count}} < 3
    {{response}} = CALL enhanced_model()
    {{retry_count}} += 1
    RETURN {{response}}
ELIF {{user_satisfaction}} < 3 AND {{retry_count}} >= 3
    {{response}} = CALL human_review()
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS {{sensitive_words}}
    CALL log_to_security()
    RETURN "æœåŠ¡ä¸å¯ç”¨"
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    {{confirmation}} = CALL verify_identity()
    IF {{confirmation}} == "approved"
        RETURN {{results}}
    ELSE
        RETURN "èº«ä»½éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{response_timeout}}
    {{response}} = CALL degraded_service()
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{alert_qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time_95}} > {{response_time_95_threshold}} FOR {{response_time_95_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF

async def main_workflow(input_params: dict):
    """
    ä¸»å·¥ä½œæµ - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ
    
    Args:
        input_params: åŒ…å« ['cache_hit_rate', 'click_count', 'code', 'code_language', 'code_lines', 'error_count', 'is_finance', 'is_sensitive', 'knowledge_base', 'log_days', 'qps', 'query_type', 'response_time', 'similarity', 'user_type', 'vi_a', 'vi_b', 'vi_c'] çš„å­—å…¸
    
    Returns:
        æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    # Module 1: step_1_compute_cache_duration
    ctx["alert_duration"], ctx["cache_duration"], ctx["max_click"], ctx["max_concurrent"], ctx["p95_threshold"], ctx["qps_threshold"], ctx["response_threshold"], ctx["vector_dim"] = step_1_compute_cache_duration(ctx.get("cache_hit_rate"), ctx.get("click_count"), ctx.get("code_language"), ctx.get("code_lines"), ctx.get("error_count"), ctx.get("is_finance"), ctx.get("is_sensitive"), ctx.get("kg_results"), ctx.get("knowledge_base"), ctx.get("log_days"), ctx.get("model_type"), ctx.get("priority"), ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("user_type"), ctx.get("vector_results"), ctx.get("vi_a"), ctx.get("vi_b"), ctx.get("vi_c"))

    # Module 2: step_2_vector_search
    ctx["__kg_results__"], ctx["analysis_result"], ctx["doc"], ctx["kg_results"], ctx["vector_results"] = await step_2_vector_search(ctx.get("cache_duration"), ctx.get("code"), ctx.get("code_language"), ctx.get("code_lines"), ctx.get("knowledge_base"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("similarity"))

    # Module 3: step_3_compute_model_type
    ctx["model_type"] = step_3_compute_model_type(ctx.get("click_count"), ctx.get("max_click"))

    # Module 4: step_4_compute_priority
    ctx["priority"] = step_4_compute_priority(ctx.get("user_type"))

    # Module 5: step_5_process
    step_5_process(ctx.get("is_sensitive"))

    # Module 6: step_6_verify_identity

    Args:

    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    ctx["alert_duration"], ctx["cache_duration"], ctx["max_click"], ctx["max_concurrent"], ctx["p95_threshold"], ctx["qps_threshold"], ctx["response_threshold"], ctx["vector_dim"] = step_1_compute_cache_duration(ctx.get("cache_hit_rate"), ctx.get("click_count"), ctx.get("code_language"), ctx.get("code_lines"), ctx.get("error_count"), ctx.get("is_finance"), ctx.get("is_sensitive"), ctx.get("kg_results"), ctx.get("knowledge_base"), ctx.get("log_days"), ctx.get("model_type"), ctx.get("priority"), ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("user_type"), ctx.get("vector_results"), ctx.get("vi_a"), ctx.get("vi_b"), ctx.get("vi_c"))

IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{result}} = CALL vector_search({{knowledge_base}}, top_n={{max_vector_results}})

        {{result}} = CALL rerank_search({{knowledge_base}}, top_n={{fallback_vector_results}})
    ELSE
        {{result}} = CALL hybrid_search({{knowledge_base}})
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{result}} = CALL graph_search({{knowledge_base}}, hops={{kg_hops}})
    IF {{result}}.found == False
        {{result}} = CALL full_search({{knowledge_base}})
    ENDIF
    {{result}}.cache_duration = {{cache_duration}}
    CALL cache_result({{result}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{max_code_lines}}
        {{result}} = CALL static_code_analysis({{code}})
    ELSE
        {{result}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis({{code}})
        {{result}} = CALL generate_code_explanation({{result}})
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{result}} = CALL default_search({{knowledge_base}})
ENDIF
IF {{click_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{result}} = CALL strong_model_inference({{query}})
ELIF {{unhappy_count}} >= 3
    {{result}} = CALL human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{is_sensitive}} == True
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_sensitive_content({{query}})
ELIF {{is_finance}} == True
    {{result}} = CALL identity_verification()
    IF {{result}}.verified == False
        CALL reject_service()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{current_concurrent}} > {{max_concurrent}}
    CALL queue_request()
    IF {{is_vip}} == True
        {{priority}} = 5
    ELIF {{is_admin}} == True
        {{priority}} = 10
    ELSE
        {{priority}} = 1
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{timeout_threshold}}
    {{result}} = CALL degraded_service()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{vector_time_threshold}} AND {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL log_performance("vector_search", {{response_time}})
ELIF {{response_time}} > {{graph_time_threshold}} AND {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL log_performance("graph_search", {{response_time}})
ELIF {{response_time}} > {{code_time_threshold}} AND {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    CALL log_performance("code_analysis", {{response_time}})
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{alert_qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert("low_qps")
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{response_time_threshold}} FOR 5 MINUTES
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF
RETURN {{result}}

45ce73c0.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_a}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_b}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_c}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index_a}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_index_b}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_index_c}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrent}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{max_results}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{fallback_results}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{code_line_limit}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{kg_hop}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{log_retention_error}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{log_retention_access}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{log_retention_debug}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{re_rank_results}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}}, similarity_threshold={{similarity_threshold}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity >= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{top_results}} = {{results}}.top_n({{max_results}})
        RETURN {{top_results}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity < {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{re_ranked}} = CALL re_rank({{results}}, top_n={{re_rank_results}})
        RETURN {{re_ranked}}
    ELSE
        {{hybrid_results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})
        RETURN {{hybrid_results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_analysis({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_search({{intent}}, hops={{kg_hop}})
    IF {{kg_results}}.found
        {{entities}} = {{kg_results}}.entities
        {{relations}} = {{kg_results}}.relations
        RETURN {{entities}}, {{relations}}
    ELSE
        {{full_search}} = CALL full_search({{query}})
        RETURN {{full_search}}
    ENDIF
    {{cache}}.store({{query}}, {{kg_results}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    {{language}} = CALL detect_language({{query}})
    {{line_count}} = CALL count_lines({{query}})
    IF {{language}} IN ["Python", "Java"]
        IF {{line_count}} > {{code_line_limit}}
            {{static_analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{query}})
            RETURN {{static_analysis}}
        ELSE
            {{semantic_analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{query}})
            {{doc}} = CALL generate_doc({{semantic_analysis}})
            RETURN {{doc}}
        ENDIF
    ELSE
        RETURN "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ELSE
    RETURN "Unknown query type"
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{stronger_model}} = CALL use_stronger_model()
    RETURN {{stronger_model}}
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è" OR "è´¢åŠ¡" OR "æŠ•èµ„"
    {{verified}} = CALL verify_user()
    IF NOT {{verified}}
        CALL log_to_security()
        RETURN "Access denied"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity_score}}: Float
DEFINE {{retrieval_mode}}: String
DEFINE {{cache_hit}}: Boolean
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
DEFINE {{user_level}}: Integer
DEFINE {{response_time}}: Float
DEFINE {{qps}}: Integer
DEFINE {{crh}}: Float
DEFINE {{accuracy}}: Float
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{vi_a}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_b}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_c}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{retrieval_mode}} = "vector"
    IF {{similarity_score}} > 0.85
        RETURN top 3 results
    ELIF {{similarity_score}} < 0.85
        CALL reranking_model()
        RETURN top 5 results
    ELSE
        {{retrieval_mode}} = "hybrid"
        RETURN search_results
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    {{retrieval_mode}} = "graph"
    FOR {{hop}} IN [1, 2]
        CALL kg_search(hop={{hop}})
        IF {{match_found}}
            RETURN entities_and_relations
        ENDIF
    ENDFOR
    CALL full_search()
    RETURN search_results
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        CALL static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
        CALL semantic_analysis()
        CALL generate_explanation()
    ENDIF
ELSE
    RETURN "Unsupported query type"
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    CALL enhanced_reasoning_model()
ELIF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL human_review_queue()
ENDIF
IF {{sensitive_words_detected}}
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_to_security()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    CALL user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > 3.0
    CALL service_downgrade()
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < 10 FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{user_level}} == 10
    {{priority}} = "admin"
ELIF {{user_level}} == 5
    {{priority}} = "vip"
ELSE
    {{priority}} = "normal"
ENDIF
IF {{concurrent_requests}} > {{max_concurrency}}
    {{waiting}} = True
ENDIF
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="error", retention_days=90)
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="access", retention_days=30)
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="debug", retention_days=7)
RETURN system_status

DEFINE {{knowledge_base_a}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_b}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_c}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index_a}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_index_b}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_index_c}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrent}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{max_results}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{fallback_results}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{code_line_limit}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{kg_hop}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{log_retention_error}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{log_retention_access}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{log_retention_debug}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{re_rank_results}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}}, similarity_threshold={{similarity_threshold}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity >= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{top_results}} = {{results}}.top_n({{max_results}})
        RETURN {{top_results}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity < {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{re_ranked}} = CALL re_rank({{results}}, top_n={{re_rank_results}})
        RETURN {{re_ranked}}
    ELSE
        {{hybrid_results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})
        RETURN {{hybrid_results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_analysis({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_search({{intent}}, hops={{kg_hop}})
    IF {{kg_results}}.found
        {{entities}} = {{kg_results}}.entities
        {{relations}} = {{kg_results}}.relations
        RETURN {{entities}}, {{relations}}
    ELSE
        {{full_search}} = CALL full_search({{query}})
        RETURN {{full_search}}
    ENDIF
    {{cache}}.store({{query}}, {{kg_results}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    {{language}} = CALL detect_language({{query}})
    {{line_count}} = CALL count_lines({{query}})
    IF {{language}} IN ["Python", "Java"]
        IF {{line_count}} > {{code_line_limit}}
            {{static_analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{query}})
            RETURN {{static_analysis}}
        ELSE
            {{semantic_analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{query}})
            {{doc}} = CALL generate_doc({{semantic_analysis}})
            RETURN {{doc}}
        ENDIF
    ELSE
        RETURN "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ELSE
    RETURN "Unknown query type"
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{stronger_model}} = CALL use_stronger_model()
    RETURN {{stronger_model}}
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è" OR "è´¢åŠ¡" OR "æŠ•èµ„"
    {{verified}} = CALL verify_user()
    IF NOT {{verified}}
        CALL log_to_security()
        RETURN "Access denied"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
{{log}} = CALL create_log({{query}}, {{response}})
CALL upload_to_central_logging({{log}})

eaa5cc53.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity}}: Float
DEFINE {{cache_valid}}: Boolean
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
DEFINE {{user_level}}: Integer
DEFINE {{response_time}}: Float
DEFINE {{qps}}: Float
DEFINE {{error_log_days}}: Integer
DEFINE {{access_log_days}}: Integer
DEFINE {{debug_log_days}}: Integer
DEFINE {{cache_hit_rate}}: Float
DEFINE {{retrieval_accuracy}}: Float
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer
DEFINE {{vi_a}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_b}}: String
DEFINE {{vi_c}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{result}} = CALL vector_search(top_k=3)
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= 0.85
        {{result}} = CALL rerank_search(top_k=5)
    ELSE
        {{result}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{result}} = CALL kg_search(hops=2)
    IF {{result}}.found == False
        {{result}} = CALL full_search()
    ENDIF
    {{result}}.cache_valid = {{cache_valid}}
    {{result}}.cache_ttl = 1800
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{result}} = CALL code_analysis(analysis_type="static")
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{result}} = CALL code_analysis(analysis_type="semantic")
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{result}} = CALL default_search()
ENDIF
IF {{user_level}} == 10
    {{priority}} = 10
ELIF {{user_level}} == 5
    {{priority}} = 5
ELSE
    {{priority}} = 1
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è"
    {{auth_result}} = CALL verify_identity()
    IF {{auth_result}} == False
        {{result}} = CALL reject_service()
        CALL log_security_event()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > 3
    {{result}} = CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < 10
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
{{result}} = CALL log_management(
    error_days={{error_log_days}}, 
    access_days={{access_log_days}}, 
    debug_days={{debug_log_days}}
)
{{result}} = CALL monitor_system(
    qps={{qps}}, 
    response_time={{response_time}}, 
    cache_hit_rate={{cache_hit_rate}}, 
    retrieval_accuracy={{retrieval_accuracy}}
)
RETURN {{result}}

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{query_type}}: String
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: Float = 0.85
DEFINE {{max_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{max_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 1800  # 30åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{response_time_vector}}: Integer = 500  # ms
DEFINE {{response_time_graph}}: Integer = 1000  # ms
DEFINE {{response_time_code}}: Integer = 2000  # ms
DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3000  # ms
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{alert_duration}}: Integer = 600  # 10åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{p95_threshold}}: Integer = 3000  # 3ç§’
DEFINE {{p95_alert_duration}}: Integer = 300  # 5åˆ†é’Ÿ
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_a}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_b}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{knowledge_base_c}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index}}: String
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{log_retention_error}}: Integer = 90  # å¤©
DEFINE {{log_retention_access}}: Integer = 30  # å¤©
DEFINE {{log_retention_debug}}: Integer = 7  # å¤©
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(max_results={{max_results_high})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_search(max_results={{max_results_low})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{graph_results}} = CALL graph_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{graph_results}}.found
        RETURN {{graph_results}}
    ELSE
        {{graph_results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
        {{cache}}.store({{graph_results}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
        RETURN {{graph_results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_documentation({{analysis}})
        RETURN {{documentation}}
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL fallback_search()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_click}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL enhanced_model_search()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_satisfaction}} < 3
    {{results}} = CALL human_review_queue()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_words"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_to_security()
    RETURN "æœåŠ¡ä¸å¯ç”¨"
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    {{confirmation}} = CALL verify_user_identity()
    IF NOT {{confirmation}}.verified
        RETURN "èº«ä»½éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_time}}
    {{results}} = CALL degraded_service()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}} FOR {{alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > {{p95_threshold}} FOR {{p95_alert_duration}} MINUTES
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF

eaa5cc53.prompt40_main_code:
async def main_workflow(input_params: dict):
    """
    ä¸»å·¥ä½œæµ - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ
    
    Args:
        input_params: åŒ…å« ['access_log_days', 'alert_duration', 'cache_hit_rate', 'cache_valid', 'code_lines', 'debug_log_days', 'error_log_days', 'max_concurrency', 'qps', 'query', 'query_type', 'response_time', 'retrieval_accuracy', 'similarity', 'user_level', 'vector_dim', 'vi_a', 'vi_b', 'vi_c'] çš„å­—å…¸
    
    Returns:
        æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    # Module 1: step_1_process
    step_1_process(ctx.get("access_log_days"), ctx.get("alert_duration"), ctx.get("cache_hit_rate"), ctx.get("cache_valid"), ctx.get("code_lines"), ctx.get("debug_log_days"), ctx.get("error_log_days"), ctx.get("max_concurrency"), ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("retrieval_accuracy"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("user_level"), ctx.get("vector_dim"), ctx.get("vi_a"), ctx.get("vi_b"), ctx.get("vi_c"))

    # Module 2: step_2_vector_search
    ctx["result"] = await step_2_vector_search(ctx.get("cache_valid"), ctx.get("code_lines"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("similarity"))

    # Module 3: step_3_compute_priority
    ctx["priority"] = step_3_compute_priority(ctx.get("user_level"))

    # Module 4: step_4_verify_identity
    ctx["auth_result"], ctx["result"] = await step_4_verify_identity(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 5: step_5_degrade_service
    ctx["result"] = await step_5_degrade_service(ctx.get("response_time"))

    # Module 6: step_6_trigger_alert
    await step_6_trigger_alert(ctx.get("qps"))

    # Module 7: step_7_log_management
    ctx["result"] = await step_7_log_management(ctx.get("access_log_days"), ctx.get("debug_log_days"), ctx.get("error_log_days"))

    # Module 8: step_8_monitor_system
    ctx["result"] = await step_8_monitor_system(ctx.get("cache_hit_rate"), ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("retrieval_accuracy"))

    # Module 9: step_9_compute_result
    ctx["__result__"] = step_9_compute_result(ctx.get("result"))

    return ctx

722e0357.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: String = "0.85"
DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{neighbor_hops}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ["Python", "Java"]
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{negative_feedback_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{user_priority_normal}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{user_priority_vip}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{user_priority_admin}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{vector_search_timeout}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{p95_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{p95_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model({{query}})
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = CALL extract_relations({{entities}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_result({{results}}, expiration={{cache_expiration}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    {{code_lines}} = CALL count_code_lines({{code}})
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
        {{doc}} = CALL generate_explanation({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_model_search({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
{{feedback_count}} = 0
IF {{user_satisfaction}} == "unsatisfied"
    {{feedback_count}} = {{feedback_count}} + 1
    IF {{feedback_count}} >= {{negative_feedback_threshold}}
        CALL escalate_to_human_review()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
{{medical_docs}} = CALL load_docs("medical", count={{medical_docs_count}})
{{tech_docs}} = CALL load_docs("technical", count={{tech_docs_count}})
{{legal_docs}} = CALL load_docs("legal", count={{legal_docs_count}})
{{medical_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{medical_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{tech_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{tech_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{legal_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{legal_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{current_concurrency}} = CALL get_current_concurrency()
IF {{current_concurrency}} >= {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
{{user_priority}} = CALL get_user_priority()
IF {{user_priority}} == {{user_priority_admin}}
    CALL prioritize_request(level=10)
ELIF {{user_priority}} == {{user_priority_vip}}
    CALL prioritize_request(level=5)
ELSE
    CALL prioritize_request(level=1)
ENDIF
{{query}} = CALL sensitive_word_filter({{query}})
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "è¿è§„å†…å®¹"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è"
    CALL require_secondary_authentication()
ENDIF
{{vector_time}} = CALL measure_time(vector_search())
IF {{vector_time}} > {{vector_search_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{graph_time}} = CALL measure_time(graph_search())
IF {{graph_time}} > {{graph_search_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{code_time}} = CALL measure_time(code_analysis())
IF {{code_time}} > {{code_analysis_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{total_time}} = CALL measure_total_time()
IF {{total_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log(log_type="error", retention={{error_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="access", retention={{access_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="debug", retention={{debug_log_retention}})
{{qps}} = CALL get_current_qps()
{{p95}} = CALL get_p95_latency()
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95}} > {{p95_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: String = "0.85"
DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{neighbor_hops}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ["Python", "Java"]
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{negative_feedback_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{user_priority_normal}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{user_priority_vip}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{user_priority_admin}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{vector_search_timeout}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{p95_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{p95_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL vector_retrieval_engine()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    CALL graph_database_search()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_related"
    CALL code_analysis_engine()
ELSE
    CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity_score}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity_score}} <= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL reranking_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{graph_results}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{graph_results}}.matched_nodes > 0
        {{response}} = CALL format_graph_results({{graph_results}})
    ELSE
        {{response}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    {{cache}}.store({{query}}, {{response}}, expiration={{cache_expiration}})
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "code_related"
    IF {{supported_languages}} CONTAINS {{code_language}}
        IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
            {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
        ELSE
            {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
            {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_docs({{analysis}})
        ENDIF
    ELSE
        {{response}} = "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL enhanced_reasoning_model()
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= {{negative_feedback_threshold}}
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS {{sensitive_words}}
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_sensitive_query()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    CALL secondary_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL service_degradation()
ENDIF
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="error", retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="access", retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
CALL log_to_central_system(log_type="debug", retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_latency}} > {{p95_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF
RETURN {{response}}

DEFINE {{similarity_threshold}}: String = "0.85"
DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{neighbor_hops}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ["Python", "Java"]
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{negative_feedback_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_index_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{user_priority_normal}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{user_priority_vip}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{user_priority_admin}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{vector_search_timeout}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{p95_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{p95_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model({{query}})
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{top_k_results_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = CALL extract_relations({{entities}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_result({{results}}, expiration={{cache_expiration}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    {{code_lines}} = CALL count_code_lines({{code}})
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
        {{doc}} = CALL generate_explanation({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_model_search({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
{{feedback_count}} = 0
IF {{user_satisfaction}} == "unsatisfied"
    {{feedback_count}} = {{feedback_count}} + 1
    IF {{feedback_count}} >= {{negative_feedback_threshold}}
        CALL escalate_to_human_review()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
{{medical_docs}} = CALL load_docs("medical", count={{medical_docs_count}})
{{tech_docs}} = CALL load_docs("technical", count={{tech_docs_count}})
{{legal_docs}} = CALL load_docs("legal", count={{legal_docs_count}})
{{medical_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{medical_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{tech_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{tech_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{legal_vi}} = CALL create_vector_index({{legal_docs}}, dim={{vector_index_dim}})
{{current_concurrency}} = CALL get_current_concurrency()
IF {{current_concurrency}} >= {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
{{user_priority}} = CALL get_user_priority()
IF {{user_priority}} == {{user_priority_admin}}
    CALL prioritize_request(level=10)
ELIF {{user_priority}} == {{user_priority_vip}}
    CALL prioritize_request(level=5)
ELSE
    CALL prioritize_request(level=1)
ENDIF
{{query}} = CALL sensitive_word_filter({{query}})
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "è¿è§„å†…å®¹"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è"
    CALL require_secondary_authentication()
ENDIF
{{vector_time}} = CALL measure_time(vector_search())
IF {{vector_time}} > {{vector_search_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{graph_time}} = CALL measure_time(graph_search())
IF {{graph_time}} > {{graph_search_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{code_time}} = CALL measure_time(code_analysis())
IF {{code_time}} > {{code_analysis_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
{{total_time}} = CALL measure_total_time()
IF {{total_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log(log_type="error", retention={{error_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="access", retention={{access_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="debug", retention={{debug_log_retention}})
{{qps}} = CALL get_current_qps()
{{p95}} = CALL get_p95_latency()
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95}} > {{p95_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF

async def main_workflow(input_params: dict):
    """
    ä¸»å·¥ä½œæµ - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ
    
    Args:
        input_params: åŒ…å« ['code', 'query_type', 'similarity', 'user_feedback', 'user_satisfaction'] çš„å­—å…¸
    
    Returns:
        æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    # Module 1: step_1_compute_similarity_threshold
    ctx["access_log_retention"], ctx["cache_expiration"], ctx["code_analysis_timeout"], ctx["code_line_threshold"], ctx["debug_log_retention"], ctx["error_log_retention"], ctx["graph_search_timeout"], ctx["legal_docs_count"], ctx["max_concurrency"], ctx["medical_docs_count"], ctx["negative_feedback_threshold"], ctx["neighbor_hops"], ctx["p95_alert_duration"], ctx["p95_alert_threshold"], ctx["qps_alert_duration"], ctx["qps_alert_threshold"], ctx["similarity_threshold"], ctx["supported_languages"], ctx["tech_docs_count"], ctx["top_k_results_high"], ctx["top_k_results_low"], ctx["total_response_timeout"], ctx["user_priority_admin"], ctx["user_priority_normal"], ctx["user_priority_vip"], ctx["vector_index_dim"], ctx["vector_search_timeout"] = step_1_compute_similarity_threshold()

    # Module 2: step_2_vector_search
    ctx["__analysis__"], ctx["__results__"], ctx["analysis"], ctx["code_lines"], ctx["doc"], ctx["entities"], ctx["results"] = await step_2_vector_search(ctx.get("cache_expiration"), ctx.get("code"), ctx.get("code_line_threshold"), ctx.get("neighbor_hops"), ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("similarity_threshold"), ctx.get("top_k_results_high"), ctx.get("top_k_results_low"))

    # Module 3: step_3_strong_model_search
    ctx["__results__"], ctx["results"] = await step_3_strong_model_search(ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("user_feedback"))

    # Module 4: step_4_compute_feedback_count
    ctx["feedback_count"] = step_4_compute_feedback_count()

    # Module 5: step_5_escalate_to_human_review
    ctx["feedback_count"] = await step_5_escalate_to_human_review(ctx.get("negative_feedback_threshold"), ctx.get("user_satisfaction"))

    # Module 6: step_6_load_docs
    ctx["medical_docs"] = await step_6_load_docs(ctx.get("medical_docs_count"))

    # Module 7: step_7_load_docs
    ctx["tech_docs"] = await step_7_load_docs(ctx.get("tech_docs_count"))

    # Module 8: step_8_load_docs
    ctx["legal_docs"] = await step_8_load_docs(ctx.get("legal_docs_count"))

    # Module 9: step_9_create_vector_index
    ctx["medical_vi"] = await step_9_create_vector_index(ctx.get("medical_docs"), ctx.get("vector_index_dim"))

    # Module 10: step_10_create_vector_index
    ctx["tech_vi"] = await step_10_create_vector_index(ctx.get("tech_docs"), ctx.get("vector_index_dim"))

    # Module 11: step_11_create_vector_index
    ctx["legal_vi"] = await step_11_create_vector_index(ctx.get("legal_docs"), ctx.get("vector_index_dim"))

    # Module 12: step_12_get_current_concurrency
    ctx["current_concurrency"] = await step_12_get_current_concurrency()

    # Module 13: step_13_queue_request
    await step_13_queue_request(ctx.get("current_concurrency"), ctx.get("max_concurrency"))

    # Module 14: step_14_get_user_priority
    ctx["user_priority"] = await step_14_get_user_priority()

    # Module 15: step_15_prioritize_request
    step_15_prioritize_request(ctx.get("user_priority"), ctx.get("user_priority_admin"), ctx.get("user_priority_vip"))

    # Module 16: step_16_sensitive_word_filter
    ctx["query"] = await step_16_sensitive_word_filter()

    # Module 17: step_17_reject_service
    await step_17_reject_service(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 18: step_18_require_secondary_authentication
    await step_18_require_secondary_authentication(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 19: step_19_measure_time
    ctx["vector_time"] = await step_19_measure_time()

    # Module 20: step_20_degrade_service
    await step_20_degrade_service(ctx.get("vector_search_timeout"), ctx.get("vector_time"))

    # Module 21: step_21_measure_time
    ctx["graph_time"] = await step_21_measure_time()

    # Module 22: step_22_degrade_service
    await step_22_degrade_service(ctx.get("graph_search_timeout"), ctx.get("graph_time"))

    # Module 23: step_23_measure_time
    ctx["code_time"] = await step_23_measure_time()

    # Module 24: step_24_degrade_service
    await step_24_degrade_service(ctx.get("code_analysis_timeout"), ctx.get("code_time"))

    # Module 25: step_25_measure_total_time
    ctx["total_time"] = await step_25_measure_total_time()

    # Module 26: step_26_degrade_service
    await step_26_degrade_service(ctx.get("total_response_timeout"), ctx.get("total_time"))

    # Module 27: step_27_upload_log
    step_27_upload_log(ctx.get("error_log_retention"))

    # Module 28: step_28_upload_log
    step_28_upload_log(ctx.get("access_log_retention"))

    # Module 29: step_29_upload_log
    step_29_upload_log(ctx.get("debug_log_retention"))

    # Module 30: step_30_get_current_qps
    ctx["qps"] = await step_30_get_current_qps()

    # Module 31: step_31_get_p95_latency
    ctx["p95"] = await step_31_get_p95_latency()

    # Module 32: step_32_trigger_alert
    await step_32_trigger_alert(ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("qps_alert_threshold"))

    # Module 33: step_33_trigger_scaling
    await step_33_trigger_scaling(ctx.get("p95"), ctx.get("p95_alert_threshold"))

    return ctx

DEFINE {{vector_similarity_threshold}}: String = "0.85"
DEFINE {{vector_top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{vector_top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{kg_neighbor_hops}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{cache_expiration_minutes}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{code_line_threshold}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{user_priority_normal}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{user_priority_vip}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{user_priority_admin}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{vector_response_time_ms}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{graph_response_time_s}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_time_s}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_time_s}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_95th_alert}}: Integer = 3
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_results_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_results_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intents}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{graph_results}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{kg_neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{graph_results}}.found
        {{results}} = {{graph_results}}.entities_and_relations
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_results({{results}}, expiration_minutes={{cache_expiration_minutes}})
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer = CALL count_code_lines({{query}})
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis({{query}})
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis({{query}})
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_documentation({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
    {{results}} = {{analysis}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_incident()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL require_user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_time_s}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log_to_central_system(log_type="error", retention_days={{error_log_retention_days}})
CALL upload_log_to_central_system(log_type="access", retention_days={{access_log_retention_days}})
CALL upload_log_to_central_system(log_type="debug", retention_days={{debug_log_retention_days}})
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert("Low QPS")
ENDIF
IF {{response_time_95th}} > {{response_time_95th_alert}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF
RETURN {{results}}

DEFINE {{response_time_95th_alert}}: Integer = 3
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{vector_similarity}} > {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_results_high}}
    ELIF {{vector_similarity}} <= {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_results_low}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent_components}} = CALL intent_decomposition()
    {{results}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{kg_neighbor_hops}}
    IF {{results}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = CALL cache_get()
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_search()
        CALL cache_set(expiration={{cache_expiration_minutes}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= {{code_line_threshold}}
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis()
        {{analysis}} = CALL generate_explanation()
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL enhanced_model()
IF {{user_feedback_count}} >= 3
    {{results}} = CALL human_review()
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è"
    CALL identity_verification()
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}} FOR 10 MINUTES
    CALL trigger_alert()
IF {{response_time_95th}} > {{response_time_95th_alert}} FOR 5 MINUTES
    CALL scale_out()
CALL log_upload(log_type="error", retention_days={{error_log_retention_days}})
CALL log_upload(log_type="access", retention_days={{access_log_retention_days}})
CALL log_upload(log_type="debug", retention_days={{debug_log_retention_days}})

async def main_workflow(input_params: dict):
    """
    ä¸»å·¥ä½œæµ - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ
    
    Args:
        input_params: åŒ…å« ['negative_feedback_count', 'qps', 'query', 'query_type', 'response_time', 'response_time_95th', 'similarity', 'user_feedback'] çš„å­—å…¸
    
    Returns:
        æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    # Module 1: step_1_compute_vector_similarity_threshold
    ctx["access_log_retention_days"], ctx["cache_expiration_minutes"], ctx["code_analysis_time_s"], ctx["code_line_threshold"], ctx["debug_log_retention_days"], ctx["error_log_retention_days"], ctx["graph_response_time_s"], ctx["kg_neighbor_hops"], ctx["legal_docs_count"], ctx["max_concurrent_requests"], ctx["medical_docs_count"], ctx["qps_alert_threshold"], ctx["response_time_95th_alert"], ctx["tech_docs_count"], ctx["total_response_time_s"], ctx["user_priority_admin"], ctx["user_priority_normal"], ctx["user_priority_vip"], ctx["vector_dim"], ctx["vector_response_time_ms"], ctx["vector_similarity_threshold"], ctx["vector_top_k_results_high"], ctx["vector_top_k_results_low"] = step_1_compute_vector_similarity_threshold()

    # Module 2: step_2_vector_search
    ctx["results"] = await step_2_vector_search(ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("vector_similarity_threshold"), ctx.get("vector_top_k_results_high"), ctx.get("vector_top_k_results_low"))

    # Module 3: step_3_intent_decomposition
    ctx["graph_results"], ctx["intents"], ctx["results"] = await step_3_intent_decomposition(ctx.get("cache_expiration_minutes"), ctx.get("kg_neighbor_hops"), ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("query_type"))

    # Module 4: step_4_static_code_analysis
    ctx["analysis"], ctx["code_lines"], ctx["documentation"], ctx["results"] = await step_4_static_code_analysis(ctx.get("code_line_threshold"), ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("query_type"))

    # Module 5: step_5_strong_reasoning_model
    ctx["results"] = await step_5_strong_reasoning_model(ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("user_feedback"))

    # Module 6: step_6_escalate_to_human_review
    await step_6_escalate_to_human_review(ctx.get("negative_feedback_count"), ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 7: step_7_reject_service
    await step_7_reject_service(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 8: step_8_require_user_authentication
    await step_8_require_user_authentication(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 9: step_9_degrade_service
    await step_9_degrade_service(ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("total_response_time_s"))

    # Module 10: step_10_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_10_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("error_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 11: step_11_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_11_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("access_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 12: step_12_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_12_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("debug_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 13: step_13_trigger_alert
    await step_13_trigger_alert(ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("qps_alert_threshold"))

    # Module 14: step_14_trigger_scaling
    await step_14_trigger_scaling(ctx.get("response_time_95th"), ctx.get("response_time_95th_alert"))

    # Module 15: step_15_compute_results
    ctx["__results__"] = step_15_compute_results(ctx.get("results"))

    return ctx

async def main_workflow(input_params: dict):

    ä¸»å·¥ä½œæµ - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ
    
    Args:
        input_params: åŒ…å« ['negative_feedback_count', 'qps', 'query', 'query_type', 'response_time', 'response_time_95th', 'similarity', 'user_feedback'] çš„å­—å…¸
    
    Returns:

    """
    # åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
    ctx = input_params.copy()

    # Module 1: step_1_compute_vector_similarity_threshold
    ctx["access_log_retention_days"], ctx["cache_expiration_minutes"], ctx["code_analysis_time_s"], ctx["code_line_threshold"], ctx["debug_log_retention_days"], ctx["error_log_retention_days"], ctx["graph_response_time_s"], ctx["kg_neighbor_hops"], ctx["legal_docs_count"], ctx["max_concurrent_requests"], ctx["medical_docs_count"], ctx["qps_alert_threshold"], ctx["response_time_95th_alert"], ctx["tech_docs_count"], ctx["total_response_time_s"], ctx["user_priority_admin"], ctx["user_priority_normal"], ctx["user_priority_vip"], ctx["vector_dim"], ctx["vector_response_time_ms"], ctx["vector_similarity_threshold"], ctx["vector_top_k_results_high"], ctx["vector_top_k_results_low"] = step_1_compute_vector_similarity_threshold()

    # Module 2: step_2_vector_search
    ctx["results"] = await step_2_vector_search(ctx.get("query_type"), ctx.get("similarity"), ctx.get("vector_similarity_threshold"), ctx.get("vector_top_k_results_high"), ctx.get("vector_top_k_results_low"))

    # Module 3: step_3_intent_decomposition
    ctx["graph_results"], ctx["intents"], ctx["results"] = await step_3_intent_decomposition(ctx.get("cache_expiration_minutes"), ctx.get("kg_neighbor_hops"), ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("query_type"))

    # Module 4: step_4_static_code_analysis
    ctx["analysis"], ctx["code_lines"], ctx["documentation"], ctx["results"] = await step_4_static_code_analysis(ctx.get("code_line_threshold"), ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("query_type"))

    # Module 5: step_5_strong_reasoning_model
    ctx["results"] = await step_5_strong_reasoning_model(ctx.get("query"), ctx.get("user_feedback"))

    # Module 6: step_6_escalate_to_human_review
    await step_6_escalate_to_human_review(ctx.get("negative_feedback_count"), ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 7: step_7_reject_service
    await step_7_reject_service(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 8: step_8_require_user_authentication
    await step_8_require_user_authentication(ctx.get("query"))

    # Module 9: step_9_degrade_service
    await step_9_degrade_service(ctx.get("response_time"), ctx.get("total_response_time_s"))

    # Module 10: step_10_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_10_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("error_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 11: step_11_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_11_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("access_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 12: step_12_upload_log_to_central_system
    step_12_upload_log_to_central_system(ctx.get("debug_log_retention_days"))

    # Module 13: step_13_trigger_alert
    await step_13_trigger_alert(ctx.get("qps"), ctx.get("qps_alert_threshold"))

    # Module 14: step_14_trigger_scaling
    await step_14_trigger_scaling(ctx.get("response_time_95th"), ctx.get("response_time_95th_alert"))

    # Module 15: step_15_compute_results
    ctx["__results__"] = step_15_compute_results(ctx.get("results"))

    return ctx

DEFINE {{vector_dim}}: Integer = 1536
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{user_priority_normal}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{user_priority_vip}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{user_priority_admin}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{vector_response_time}}: Integer = 500
DEFINE {{graph_response_time}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_time}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{p95_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{current_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 0
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
    {{response}} = CALL format_response({{results}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intents}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL kg_search(hops={{kg_neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{kg_results}}.matched_nodes > 0
        {{response}} = CALL format_kg_response({{kg_results}})
    ELSE
        {{response}} = CALL full_kg_search()
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_result({{response}}, expiration_minutes={{cache_expiration_minutes}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{language}} IN {{code_languages}}
        IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
            {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
        ELSE
            {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
            {{doc}} = CALL generate_explanation({{analysis}})
        ENDIF
        {{response}} = CALL format_code_response({{analysis}}, {{doc}})
    ELSE
        {{response}} = "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{response}} = "Unknown query type"
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL strong_model_inference({{query}})
ELIF {{user_feedback}}.negative_count >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
{{current_concurrent_requests}} = {{current_concurrent_requests}} + 1
IF {{current_concurrent_requests}} > {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    CALL queue_request({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event({{query}})
ELIF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL require_user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_time}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log({{access_log}}, retention_days={{access_log_retention_days}})
CALL upload_log({{error_log}}, retention_days={{error_log_retention_days}})
CALL upload_log({{debug_log}}, retention_days={{debug_log_retention_days}})
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert("Low QPS")
IF {{p95_latency}} > {{p95_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
RETURN {{response}}

DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500

DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3

DEFINE {{access_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention_days}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{p95_alert_threshold}}: Integer = 3
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_high}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= {{vector_similarity_threshold}}
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_top_k_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_decomposition()
    {{results}} = CALL graph_search(hops={{kg_neighbor_hops}})
    IF {{results}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = CALL get_related_entities_and_relations()
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    {{results}} = CALL cache_result(expiration_minutes={{cache_expiration_minutes}})
ELSE
    IF {{code_language}} IN {{code_languages}}
        IF {{code_lines}} > {{code_line_threshold}}
            {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
        ELSE
            {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
            {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_documentation()
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model()
ENDIF
IF {{user_unsatisfied_count}} >= 3
    {{response}} = CALL human_review_queue()
ENDIF
IF {{query_content}} CONTAINS "sensitive_words"

IF {{qps}} < {{qps_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > {{p95_alert_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF

2ce1a8d8.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{high_result_limit}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{low_result_limit}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ['Python', 'Java']
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_retrieval_time}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_time}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
DEFINE {{current_requests}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL vector_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    CALL graph_database_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_related"
    CALL code_analysis_engine()
ENDIF
FUNCTION vector_retrieval()
    IF {{similarity_score}} > 0.85
        {{results}} = get_top_n_results({{high_result_limit}})
    ELIF {{similarity_score}} < 0.85
        {{results}} = rerank_and_get_top_n({{low_result_limit}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = fallback_to_hybrid_retrieval()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDFUNCTION
FUNCTION graph_database_retrieval()
    {{cache_key}} = generate_cache_key()
    IF cache_exists({{cache_key}})
        {{results}} = get_from_cache({{cache_key}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = explore_knowledge_graph(2)
        store_in_cache({{cache_key}}, {{results}}, {{cache_expiration}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDFUNCTION
FUNCTION code_analysis_engine()
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis_result}} = perform_static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
        {{analysis_result}} = perform_full_analysis()
        generate_explanation_document()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis_result}}
ENDFUNCTION
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    CALL use_stronger_model()
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{current_requests}} < {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    process_request()
ELSE
    add_to_queue()
ENDIF
IF {{sensitive_words_detected}}
    reject_request()
    log_to_security_system()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    CALL request_user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_time}}
    trigger_degradation_service()
ENDIF
log_to_central_system({{access_log}})
log_to_central_system({{error_log}})
log_to_central_system({{debug_log}})
IF {{qps}} < 10
    trigger_qps_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > 3
    trigger_scaling_operation()
ENDIF
