attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{high_result_limit}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{low_result_limit}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ['Python', 'Java']
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_retrieval_time}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_time}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{result}} = CALL vector_retrieval({{query}})
    IF {{similarity_score}} > 0.85
        {{top_results}} = {{result}}.top_n = {{high_result_limit}}
    ELIF {{similarity_score}} < 0.85
        {{top_results}} = CALL rerank_model({{result}})
        {{top_results}}.top_n = {{low_result_limit}}
    ELSE
        {{top_results}} = CALL hybrid_retrieval({{query}})
    ENDIF
    {{cache}}.store({{query}}, {{top_results}}, expiration={{cache_expiration}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{graph_result}} = CALL graph_retrieval({{intent}})
    IF {{graph_result}}.found
        {{response}} = {{graph_result}}.entities_and_relations
    ELSE
        {{response}} = CALL full_search({{intent}})
    ENDIF
    {{cache}}.store({{query}}, {{response}}, expiration={{cache_expiration}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_language}} IN {{supported_languages}}
        IF {{code_lines}} > 500
            {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{code}})
        ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
            {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{code}})
            {{documentation}} = CALL generate_documentation({{analysis}})
        ENDIF
    ELSE
        {{response}} = "Unsupported language"
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{response}} = "Unknown query type"
ENDIF
IF {{user_click}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{user_satisfaction}} < 3
    {{response}} = CALL human_review_queue({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < 10
    CALL trigger_alert("Low QPS")
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > 3
    CALL trigger_alert("High response time")
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF
IF {{request_count}} > {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    {{response}} = "Queueing request"
ENDIF
IF {{user_type}} == "VIP"
    {{priority}} = 5
ELIF {{user_type}} == "admin"
    {{priority}} = 10
ELSE
    {{priority}} = 1
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    {{response}} = CALL identity_verification({{user}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_words"
    {{response}} = "Service denied"
    {{log}} = CALL log_event("sensitive_content", {{query}})
ENDIF
{{log}} = CALL upload_logs({{error_log}}, {{access_log}}, {{debug_log}})
{{log}}.retention_period = {{error_log_retention}}, {{access_log_retention}}, {{debug_log_retention}}
RETURN {{response}}

DEFINE {{high_result_limit}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{low_result_limit}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_expiration}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{supported_languages}}: List = ['Python', 'Java']
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrent_requests}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_retrieval_time}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_time}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_time}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_alert_duration}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_alert_duration}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer  # ä¿®å¤æœªå®šä¹‰å˜é‡
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    CALL vector_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    CALL intent_decomposition()
    CALL graph_retrieval()
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_related"
    CALL code_analysis_engine()
ELSE
    CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
IF {{similarity_score}} > 0.85
    {{results}} = CALL get_top_results({{high_result_limit}})
ELIF {{similarity_score}} < 0.85
    {{results}} = CALL rerank_and_get_results({{low_result_limit}})
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL get_top_results({{high_result_limit}})
ENDIF
IF {{retrieval_failed}}
    CALL switch_to_hybrid_retrieval()
ENDIF
IF {{graph_match_found}}
    {{entities}} = CALL get_entities_and_relations()
ELSE
    CALL fallback_to_full_search()
ENDIF
CALL cache_result()
{{cache_time}} = {{cache_expiration}}  # è®¾ç½®ç¼“å­˜æ—¶é—´
IF {{code_language}} IN {{supported_languages}}
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        CALL static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
        CALL full_semantic_analysis()
        CALL generate_explanation()
    ENDIF
ELSE
    CALL unsupported_language_handler()
ENDIF
IF {{user_click_regen}}
    CALL use_stronger_model()
ENDIF
IF {{user_dissatisfaction_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
{{medical_index}} = CALL create_vector_index({{medical_docs_count}})
{{tech_index}} = CALL create_vector_index({{tech_docs_count}})
{{legal_index}} = CALL create_vector_index({{legal_docs_count}})
IF {{current_requests}} > {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
IF {{user_type}} == "VIP"
    {{priority}} = 5
ELIF {{user_type}} == "admin"
    {{priority}} = 10
ELSE
    {{priority}} = 1
ENDIF
IF {{contains_sensitive_words}}
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    CALL require_secondary_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{vector_time}} > 0.5
    CALL log_slow_retrieval()
ENDIF
IF {{graph_time}} > {{graph_retrieval_time}}
    CALL log_slow_graph_query()
ENDIF
IF {{code_analysis_time}} > {{code_analysis_time}}
    CALL log_slow_code_analysis()
ENDIF
IF {{total_time}} > {{total_response_time}}
    CALL trigger_degradation()
ENDIF
CALL upload_logs_to_central_system()
{{qps}} = CALL calculate_qps()
{{avg_response_time}} = CALL calculate_avg_response_time()
{{p95_response_time}} = CALL calculate_p95_response_time()
{{cache_hit_rate}} = CALL calculate_cache_hit_rate()
{{retrieval_accuracy}} = CALL calculate_retrieval_accuracy()
IF {{qps}} < 10
    CALL trigger_qps_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > 3
    CALL trigger_scaling_alert()
ENDIF

        {{results}} = fallback_to_hybrid_retrieval()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDFUNCTION
FUNCTION graph_database_retrieval()
    {{cache_key}} = generate_cache_key()
    IF cache_exists({{cache_key}})
        {{results}} = get_from_cache({{cache_key}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = explore_knowledge_graph(2)
        store_in_cache({{cache_key}}, {{results}}, {{cache_expiration}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDFUNCTION
FUNCTION code_analysis_engine()
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis_result}} = perform_static_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} < 500
        {{analysis_result}} = perform_full_analysis()
        generate_explanation_document()
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis_result}}
ENDFUNCTION
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    CALL use_stronger_model()
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{current_requests}} < {{max_concurrent_requests}}
    process_request()
ELSE
    add_to_queue()
ENDIF
IF {{sensitive_words_detected}}
    reject_request()
    log_to_security_system()
ENDIF
IF {{query_type}} == "financial"
    CALL request_user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_time}}
    trigger_degradation_service()
ENDIF
log_to_central_system({{access_log}})
log_to_central_system({{error_log}})
log_to_central_system({{debug_log}})
IF {{qps}} < 10
    trigger_qps_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > 3
    trigger_scaling_operation()
ENDIF

618b76ac.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL graph_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = {{entities}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    {{results}} = CALL cache_result(ttl={{cache_ttl}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_doc({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model()
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL verify_user_identity()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log(log_type="error", retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="access", retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="debug", retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})
IF {{current_concurrency}} > {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
{{qps}} = CALL calculate_qps()
{{avg_response_time}} = CALL calculate_avg_response_time()
{{p95_response_time}} = CALL calculate_p95_response_time()
{{cache_hit_rate}} = CALL calculate_cache_hit_rate()
{{retrieval_accuracy}} = CALL calculate_retrieval_accuracy()
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > {{response_time_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF
RETURN {{results}}

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_threshold}}: Integer = 3
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity_score}} > 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k_low}}
    ENDIF
    IF {{results}} IS NOT NULL
        RETURN {{results}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
        RETURN {{results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL graph_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        RETURN {{entities}}
    ELSE
        {{entities}} = CALL full_graph_search()
        RETURN {{entities}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
    ELSE
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
        {{doc}} = CALL generate_code_doc({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search()
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF

DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{vector_search_top_k_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{qps_threshold}}: Integer = 10
DEFINE {{response_time_threshold}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    IF {{similarity}} > 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k}})
    ELIF {{similarity}} <= 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model()
        {{results}} = CALL vector_search(top_k={{vector_search_top_k_low}})
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search()
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{entities}} = CALL graph_search(max_hops=2)
    IF {{entities}} IS NOT NULL
        {{results}} = {{entities}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL full_graph_search()
    ENDIF
    {{results}} = CALL cache_result(ttl={{cache_ttl}})
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis()
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_code_analysis()
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_doc({{analysis}})
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_handler()
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model()
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event()
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL verify_user_identity()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL upload_log(log_type="error", retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="access", retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
CALL upload_log(log_type="debug", retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})
IF {{current_concurrency}} > {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
{{qps}} = CALL calculate_qps()
{{avg_response_time}} = CALL calculate_avg_response_time()
{{p95_response_time}} = CALL calculate_p95_response_time()
{{cache_hit_rate}} = CALL calculate_cache_hit_rate()
{{retrieval_accuracy}} = CALL calculate_retrieval_accuracy()
IF {{qps}} < {{qps_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_response_time}} > {{response_time_threshold}}
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF
RETURN {{results}}

10f2e9e7.prompt30_dsl_code:
DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{code_lines}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity > 0.85
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_high}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity <= 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model({{results}})
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_low}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL graph_search({{intent}})
    IF {{kg_results}}.found
        RETURN {{kg_results}}
    ELSE
        {{kg_results}} = CALL full_search({{intent}})
        {{kg_results}}.cache_ttl = {{cache_ttl}}
        RETURN {{kg_results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis({{query}})
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL full_code_analysis({{query}})
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_doc({{analysis}})
        RETURN {{documentation}}
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL require_user_authentication()
ENDIF
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{error_log}}, retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{access_log}}, retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{debug_log}}, retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})

attempts.dsl_code:
DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity > 0.85
        {{top_results}} = {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_high}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity <= 0.85
        {{top_results}} = CALL rerank_model({{results}})
        {{top_results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_low}}
    ELSE
        {{top_results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_results({{top_results}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
    RETURN {{top_results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL graph_search({{intent}}, max_hops=2)
    IF {{kg_results}}.matched_nodes > 0
        {{response}} = {{kg_results}}.entities_and_relations
    ELSE
        {{response}} = CALL full_search({{intent}})
    ENDIF
    CALL cache_results({{response}}, ttl={{cache_ttl}})
    RETURN {{response}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    {{language}} = CALL detect_language({{query}})
    IF {{language}} IN ["Python", "Java"]
        {{line_count}} = CALL count_lines({{query}})
        IF {{line_count}} > 500
            {{analysis}} = CALL static_analysis({{query}})
        ELSE
            {{analysis}} = CALL semantic_analysis({{query}})
        ENDIF
        {{response}} = CALL generate_code_explanation({{analysis}})
        RETURN {{response}}
    ELSE
        {{response}} = "Unsupported language"
        RETURN {{response}}
    ENDIF
ELSE
    {{response}} = "Unknown query type"
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{response}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
    RETURN {{response}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_satisfaction}} < 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "é‡‘è"
    {{verification}} = CALL verify_user_identity({{user}})
    IF {{verification}} == "failed"
        CALL reject_service()
        CALL log_to_security({{query}})
        RETURN "Service denied"
    ENDIF
ENDIF
IF {{concurrent_requests}} > {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request()
ENDIF
{{log_type}} = CALL determine_log_type({{query}})
IF {{log_type}} == "error"
    CALL store_log({{query}}, retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
ELIF {{log_type}} == "access"
    CALL store_log({{query}}, retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
ELIF {{log_type}} == "debug"
    CALL store_log({{query}}, retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})
ENDIF
IF {{qps}} < 10
    CALL trigger_alert()
ENDIF
IF {{p95_latency}} > 3
    CALL scale_out()
ENDIF

DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{medical_docs_count}}: Integer = 2000
DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000
DEFINE {{legal_docs_count}}: Integer = 1500
DEFINE {{max_concurrency}}: Integer = 50
DEFINE {{graph_search_timeout}}: Integer = 1
DEFINE {{code_analysis_timeout}}: Integer = 2
DEFINE {{total_response_timeout}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{error_log_retention}}: Integer = 90
DEFINE {{access_log_retention}}: Integer = 30
DEFINE {{debug_log_retention}}: Integer = 7
DEFINE {{concurrent_requests}}: Integer
IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity > 0.85
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_high}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity <= 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model({{results}})
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_low}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{results}}
ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{decomposed_intents}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})
    {{kg_results}} = CALL graph_search({{decomposed_intents}})
    IF {{kg_results}}.matched_nodes > 0
        RETURN {{kg_results}}
    ELSE
        {{kg_results}} = CALL full_graph_search({{query}})
        {{kg_results}}.cache_ttl = {{cache_ttl}}
        RETURN {{kg_results}}
    ENDIF
ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"
    IF {{code_lines}} > 500
        {{analysis_result}} = CALL static_code_analysis({{code}})
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{analysis_result}} = CALL full_code_analysis({{code}})
        {{analysis_result}}.generate_explanation = True
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis_result}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{concurrent_requests}} > {{max_concurrency}}
    CALL queue_request({{request}})
ELSE
    CALL process_request({{request}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_request()
    CALL log_security_event({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"
    CALL require_user_authentication()
ENDIF
IF {{response_time}} > {{total_response_timeout}}
    CALL degrade_service()
ENDIF
CALL log_to_central_system({
    "error_logs": {{error_logs}},
    "access_logs": {{access_logs}},
    "debug_logs": {{debug_logs}}
})
IF {{qps}} < 10
    CALL trigger_alert("Low QPS")
ENDIF
IF {{p95_latency}} > 3
    CALL trigger_scaling()
ENDIF

DEFINE {{top_k_results_high}}: Integer = 3
DEFINE {{top_k_results_low}}: Integer = 5
DEFINE {{cache_ttl}}: Integer = 30

DEFINE {{tech_docs_count}}: Integer = 3000

IF {{query_type}} == "simple_fact"
    {{results}} = CALL vector_search({{query}})
    IF {{results}}.similarity > 0.85
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_high}}
    ELIF {{results}}.similarity <= 0.85
        {{results}} = CALL rerank_model({{results}})
        {{results}}.top_n = {{top_k_results_low}}
    ELSE
        {{results}} = CALL hybrid_search({{query}})

ELIF {{query_type}} == "complex_reasoning"
    {{intent}} = CALL intent_decomposition({{query}})

ELIF {{query_type}} == "code_analysis"

        {{analysis}} = CALL static_code_analysis({{query}})
    ELIF {{code_lines}} <= 500
        {{analysis}} = CALL full_code_analysis({{query}})
        {{documentation}} = CALL generate_code_doc({{analysis}})
        RETURN {{documentation}}
    ENDIF
    RETURN {{analysis}}
ELSE
    {{results}} = CALL default_search({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{user_feedback}} == "regenerate"
    {{results}} = CALL strong_reasoning_model({{query}})
    RETURN {{results}}
ENDIF
IF {{negative_feedback_count}} >= 3
    CALL escalate_to_human_review({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "sensitive_word"
    CALL reject_service()
    CALL log_security_event({{query}})
ENDIF
IF {{query}} CONTAINS "financial"

ENDIF
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{error_log}}, retention_days={{error_log_retention}})
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{access_log}}, retention_days={{access_log_retention}})
CALL send_log_to_central_system({{debug_log}}, retention_days={{debug_log_retention}})
